JSSRC Resampling Library

JSSRC project is aimed at creating high quality audio resampler written in pure java.

It is based on the SSRC High Quality Audio Sampling Rate Converter by Naoki Shibata written in C.

Evaluation of the SSRC resampler can be found here.

Naohide Sano ported the C code into java.

Finally, a number of small modification was performed in order to have a java resampling service that is easy to use.
